meanings.sent1: She studied at the university for two triennia.
meanings.sent2: The company plans to release a new product every triennia.
meanings.sent3: The triennia seemed to pass by quickly, like a blink of an eye.
meanings.sent4: The growth of the tree over the triennia symbolized the passing of time.
meanings.sent5: The triennia of drought had a significant impact on the local farmers.
